00047 HandlerMapPtr Hypertable::ReactorRunner::ms_handler_map_ptr;

00052 void ReactorRunner::operator()() {
00053   int n;
00054   IOHandler *handler;
00055   std::set<IOHandler *> removed_handlers;
00056   PollTimeout timeout;
00057 
00058 #if defined(__linux__)
00059   struct epoll_event events[256];
00060 
00061   while ((n = epoll_wait(m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, events, 256, timeout.get_millis())) >= 0 || errno == EINTR) {
00062     m_reactor_ptr->get_removed_handlers(removed_handlers);
00063     HT_DEBUGF("epoll_wait returned %d events", n);
00064     for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00065       if (removed_handlers.count((IOHandler *)events[i].data.ptr) == 0) {
00066         handler = (IOHandler *)events[i].data.ptr;
00067         if (handler && handler->handle_event(&events[i])) {
00068           ms_handler_map_ptr->decomission_handler(handler->get_address());
00069           removed_handlers.insert(handler);
00070         }
00071       }
00072     }
00073     if (!removed_handlers.empty())
00074       cleanup_and_remove_handlers(removed_handlers);
00075     m_reactor_ptr->handle_timeouts(timeout);
00076     if (ms_shutdown)
00077       return;
00078   }
00079 
00080   HT_ERRORF("epoll_wait(%d) failed : %s", m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, strerror(errno));
00081 
00082 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00083   struct kevent events[32];
00084 
00085   while ((n = kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kqd, NULL, 0, events, 32, timeout.get_timespec())) >= 0 || errno == EINTR) {
00086     m_reactor_ptr->get_removed_handlers(removed_handlers);
00087     for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00088       handler = (IOHandler *)events[i].udata;
00089       if (removed_handlers.count(handler) == 0) {
00090         if (handler && handler->handle_event(&events[i])) {
00091           ms_handler_map_ptr->decomission_handler(handler->get_address());
00092           removed_handlers.insert(handler);
00093         }
00094       }
00095     }
00096     if (!removed_handlers.empty())
00097       cleanup_and_remove_handlers(removed_handlers);
00098     m_reactor_ptr->handle_timeouts(timeout);
00099     if (ms_shutdown)
00100       return;
00101   }
00102 
00103   HT_ERRORF("kevent(%d) failed : %s", m_reactor_ptr->kqd, strerror(errno));
00104 
00105 #endif
00106 }

00110 void ReactorRunner::cleanup_and_remove_handlers(std::set<IOHandler *> &handlers) {
00111   foreach(IOHandler *handler, handlers) {
00112 #if defined(__linux__)
00113     struct epoll_event event;
00114     memset(&event, 0, sizeof(struct epoll_event));
00115     if (epoll_ctl(m_reactor_ptr->poll_fd, EPOLL_CTL_DEL, handler->get_sd(), &event) < 0) {
00116       HT_ERRORF("epoll_ctl(EPOLL_CTL_DEL, %d) failure, %s", handler->get_sd(), strerror(errno));
00117     }
00118 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00119     struct kevent devents[2];
00120     EV_SET(&devents[0], handler->get_sd(), EVFILT_READ, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00121     EV_SET(&devents[1], handler->get_sd(), EVFILT_WRITE, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00122     if (kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kqd, devents, 2, NULL, 0, NULL) == -1 && errno != ENOENT) {
00123       HT_ERRORF("kevent(%d) : %s", handler->get_sd(), strerror(errno));
00124     }
00125 #else
00126     ImplementMe;
00127 #endif
00128     close(handler->get_sd());
00129     ms_handler_map_ptr->purge_handler(handler);
00130     m_reactor_ptr->cancel_requests(handler);
00131   }
00132 }
